name: Fireshare
short_description: Self-hosted video sharing - upload, organize, and stream videos to friends/family.
description: Fireshare is a self-hosted video sharing platform for sharing videos with friends and family. Simply drop videos into a watch folder and they're automatically processed, organized, and made available for streaming. Features include automatic video processing, beautiful gallery view, streaming without full download, and simple sharing links. Perfect for sharing home videos, event recordings, or personal content privately.
usecases: Share home videos with family privately.
Auto-process videos from a watch folder.
